title: Ep. 410: BLM Money Laundering | Sony & Insomniac Takes a side on abortion
itunes:title: Ep. 410: BLM Money Laundering | Sony & Insomniac Takes a side on abortion
description:
On today's episode of For Canon Sake, we talk about Sony and donation towards abortion activism.

We also discuss more information regarding BLM funds.
